name: ShreYash
description: Programming has always been my passion! I have been doing it for years and I enjoy what I do. My best languages are Python ,React , Javascript and I also learn UI/UX Design. However, I can excel in all the languages I provided. I am a fast learner and I believe that any project always needs a lot of testing before it goes through the acceptance testing, since that is what makes projects successful. I am very friendly, and my motto is not to think outside the box but build a bigger box!.
